movieDescription: Details: Directed: Shankar Bhanu Stars: Tejus Kancherla, Paayal Rajput, Dr V.K. Naresh, Nagineedu, Adityamenon Dialogues: Parashuram Lyrics: Bhaskar Bhatla Editor: Prawin Pudi Choreographer: Ganesh Swamy Executive Producer: Chinna D.O.P: C Ram Prasad Music: Radhan Co-Producer: C V Rao Producer: C Kalyan

movieInfo:
Directed by: A. V. Siva Prasad
Starring by: Ankitha Muler, ramakrishna
Genres: Romance, Thriller
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Rubin, a Muslim student living at the Harishcandra Prasad Hotel, one finde day dresses up as a Hindu girl and commits suicide. On the other hand, Raja, a young student who aspires to be a doctor, falls in love with Nandini. One day, Raja finds Nandini tying to commit a suicide. Who is behind these suicides, how Raja saves Nandini, forms the crux.

movieInfo:
Directed by: Ravi Gundaboina
Starring by: Yashwanth, Amrita Acharya, Getup Srinu
Genres: Romance
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Sameera(Amrita Acharya) is an orphan who does not enjoy life and saves all her income for the future. As time passes by, she gets affected by a deadly disease and doctors say that she has only a few months left in her life. Upset with this, she decides to enjoy the rest of the time and leaves to Thailand. There, she meets Ram(Yaswant) and falls in love with him. But Yaswant loves someone else and this breaks Sameera’s heart.

movieInfo:
Directed by:Rama Swamy
Starring by: Arjun Yagith, Bharath Bandaru, Sowmya Venugopal
Genres: Comedy, Drama
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Moodu Puvvulu Aaru Kayalu is the life story of three roommates portrayed by Arjun Yagith, Ramaswamy and Bharath Bandaru. Each of them has their own set of problems and try to come out of it.

movieInfo:
Directed by: Trinadha Rao Nakkina
Written by: Sai Krishna Biyyapu, Prasanna Kumar
Starring by: Ram Pothineni, Anupama Parameshwaran, Pranitha
Genres: Comedy, Romance
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: A middle class boy Sanju (Ram) from Kakinada comes to Hyderabad for his IT job. While he stays in the house of a family friend Vishwanath (Prakash Raj) in the city, Sanju falls for his daughter Anupama soon. Tension prevails in the house. Yet, the rapport between Sanju and Vishwanath promises some fun and here’s a predictable terrain that’s however enjoyable for a viewer.

movieInfo:
Directed by : Prabhakar Yeppa
Starring by : Abhi, Aslesha Varma
Genres: Drama
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Sahacharudu is Telugu movie released 2018. Movie directed by Prabhakar Yeppa and Abhi, Aslesha Varma play as lead role in the film.

movieInfo:
Host: Rana Daggubati
Guest: Nani, Keerthi Suresh
Genres: Reality-TV
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: No.1 Yaari with Rana Season 2 Episode – 06 (18th Nov 2018) and today guest Nani, Keerthi Suresh.

movieInfo:
Directed and written by: Kiruthiga Udhayanidhi
Starring by: Vijay Antony, Sunaina, Anjali
Genres: Action
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: An Indian doctor in the US, haunted by a recurring nightmare, learns that he is adopted, and comes to India to know his real roots. The efforts of Kaali and Gopi (Yogi Babu), a villager he befriends, to find out who among the villagers could be leads to some minor comedy. Some of it is derivative, but it is also amusing, with Yogi Babu scoring with his one-liners.

movieInfo:
Directed by: Goutham Rajkumar
Starring by: Khayyum Ali, Taniahq Rajan, Pruthvi
Genres: Action, Romance, Thriller
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Shakti (Khayyum) is a small time thief who along with his friend Jiju (Shaani) rob houses where rich, lonely and frustrated housewives live. Despite being thieves, Shakti seems to have a heart of gold and when Jiju kidnaps a sex worker (Tanishq Rajan) and tries to molest her, Shakti comes and protects her. Here the film makes one reminisce of Kshana Kshanam and dozens of other films that have a distressed damsel distressing the hero.

movieInfo:
Directed and written by: M. Rajesh
Starring by: Arya, Santhanam, Tamannaah Bhatia
Genres: Comedy
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Aishwaryabhimasthu is the tale of two friends Abhimanyu and Aasu portrayed by Arya and Santhanam respectively. They share a very thick bond which is not liked by Abhimanyu’s girlfriend (Tamannaan) and Aasu’s better half Seema(Bhanu). The girls try hard to break their friendship but things do not happen.

movieInfo:
Directed by: Mani Ratnam
Written by: Siva Ananth, Mani Ratnam
Starring by: Silambarasan, Vijay Sethupathi, Arvind Swamy
Genres: Action
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: An attempt is made on the life of a reigning don, and it sets in motion a succession battle between his three sons. In the beginning of Nawab, an attempt is made on the life of an ageing don, Senapathy (Prakash Raj). The don has three sons – the eldest one, Varadan (Arvind Swami) is hot-tempered, the second, Thyagu (Arun Vijay), a dark horse, and the third, Ethi (STR), the least favourite. And they all want to find out the person behind the attempt. The suspicion is on a rival, Chinnappadas (Thiagarajan).

movieInfo:
Directed by: Nag Ashwin
Written by: Sai Madhav Burra, Sai Madhav Burra
Starring by: Mahesh Achanta, Naga Chaitanya Akkineni, Srinivas Avasarala
Genres: Biography, Drama
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: In Bangalore, India, popular yesteryear actress Savitri is found unconscious by her young son and hospitalised, spending a year in coma. The incident receives heavy media attention, but Savitri’s initial life and whereabouts remain unknown to the public. A newspaper editor appoints Madhuravani, a stuttering journalist, and Vijay Anthony, a photographer, to write a memoir on Savitri. Madhuravani recovers a letter written by Savitri, in which she wishes to take her son to someone called Shankaraiya. Madhuravani continues her research even after she is relieved from writing the memoir by her editor, and sneaks into Savitri’s house, overhearing her aunt talk about her childhood.

movieInfo:
Directed by: Anwar Rasheed
Written by: Anjali Menon
Starring by: Dulquer Salmaan, Thilakan, Siddique
Genres: Comedy, Drama, Family, Romance
Country: India
Language: Malayalam
movieDescription: Janatha Hotel is all about the story of a young man named Faizi (Dulquer Salmaan), who is son of a rich man Abdul Razaq (Siddique). He studies in Switzerland as a chef against the wishes of his father. When his father comes to know the reality, he snatches away his passport to prevent him from taking up his new job in UK. He wants to settle his son’s marriage with Shahana (Nithya Menen). As the relation between father and son deteriorates, Faizi decides to work as a cook in a restaurant in Kozhikode (Calicut) run by his grandfather Karim (Thilakan).

movieInfo:
Directed by: K.S. Ravikumar
Starring by: Shivaji Ganesan, Rajinikanth, Ramya Krishnan
Genres: Action, Comedy, Drama, Romance
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Narasimha is an engineer who returns to his village from Chennai to attend his sister’s wedding. His sister is engaged to their maternal uncle’s son Suryaprakash. During his stay, he comes across Vasundhara, and falls in love with her. However, shyness and fear of Neelambari, her landlady, prevents Vasundhara from initially expressing her feelings. In addition, Neelambari is Suryaprakash’s spoiled sister who is also in love with Narasimha.

movieInfo:
Directed by: Bhaskar Bantupalli
Starring by: Aditya Shrivastava, Richa Saxena, Dimple
Genres: Comedy, Romance, Thriller
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: June 1:43 is a romantic-thriller film released 2017. Its directed by Bhaskar Bantupalli and Aditya Shrivastava, Richa Saxena, Dimple play as lead role in the film.

Genres: Romance

movieDescription: Enduko Emo is a Telugu romantic film released 2018. Its directed by Koti Vaddineni and Nandu, Punarnavi Bhupalam, Noel play as lead role in the movie.
